title: International Expansion Manager - Sports Management
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: International Expansion Manager Posted/Updated: 10-13-2015 Brief Job Description: The purpose of the position is to develop our expansion into new territories, a key contribution to the growth of our business. This person will assess new markets...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
